a close up view of a hand holding a clear plastic test tube with a blue label on it. the label is written in black letters and numbers. the test tube is held by a person's left hand, which is slightly visible behind the label. the person's right hand is partially hidden by the label. the background is blurred to show a black fan and a white wall.
